meanings.definition: (adjective) smallest or least impressive in size or importance
meanings.sent1: The shrimpiest flower in the garden barely reached my ankle.
meanings.sent2: She picked the shrimpiest apple from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The shrimpiest puppy tried to bark like a big dog.
meanings.sent4: His shrimpiest effort was not enough to impress the judges.
meanings.sent5: The shrimpiest star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: (adverb) in the smallest or least impressive manner
meanings.sent1: He ran shrimpiest of all the kids in the race.
meanings.sent2: She sang shrimpiest during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand shrimpiest, but nothing happened.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew shrimpiest through the open window.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel climbed shrimpiest up the tree trunk.
